## ¿Why does our office need to detect and estimate pregnancies and delivery dates?

::: notes

## Background

Use of structured data to estimate pregnancy outcomes:

![](imagenes/maddie.png){fig-align="center"}

[**Objective**]{.fg style="--col: #e64173"}: to develop an algorithm that infers patient delivery dates (PDDs) and delivery-specific details from Electronic Health Records (EHRs) with high accuracy; enabling pregnancy-level outcome studies in women’s health.

::: notes
:::
